thread.section_title: Better Music Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Better Music | bettermusic.com.au
thread.title: Lynette

author: Lynette
title: Lynette
text: The staff at Better Music were brilliant. I bought a guitar and amp for my hubby for his 40th as a surprise and I know nothing about music. The staff were extremely helpful and didn't once make me feel like a numpty for knowing nothing! The online sales team were amazing and price matched with no hesitation. Would 100% recommend and shop with them again. Thanks for helping me make his birthday extra special! :-)
